title: An Act relative to a motorcycle safety fund

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Smola of Warren, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3784) of Todd M. Smola for legislation to establish a motorcycle safety fund for motorcycle safety related activities.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-2
